title: Implement permissions v2: remove approval system, simplify to Read/Write modes
description: Remove entire approval system (ApprovalHandler, ApprovalResponse, NeedsApproval, TUI approval modal, session/permanent allowed sets). Simplify to Read/Write modes (no Agi). Remove CLI flags: -r short, -w, -y, --agi. Keep --read (long only) and --no-sandbox. See ai/design/permissions-v2.md for complete file-by-file migration plan.
